subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: D. A. Points’s final-round 67 gave him a 17-under-par 271 and a two-stroke victory over Hunter Mahan, his first win on the PGA Tour.
snippet: D. A. Points’s final-round 67 gave him a 17-under-par 271 and a two-stroke victory over Hunter Mahan, his first win on the PGA Tour.
